title: Sister Forsythe's casebook
creator_credit: Jack Zalkalns, Barry Pierce and Tasmanian Film Corporation
brief_description: Outlines the work done by a school community nurse in early detection of potentially serious health problems in students. Shows diagnosis of petit mal, child abuse, depresion resulting from overweight, bed wetting, poor coordination. Notes how the school nurse works in conjunction with parents and techers.
